about.title: Welcome to The White Horse
about.tagline: A Waterbeach coaching inn reborn with Himalayan hospitality
description: Opposite the Waterbeach village green, our thatched 1890 coaching inn was saved from redevelopment and relaunched on 6 February 2025 by the Lapen Inns family.
We now blend a lively British pub with a Nepalese restaurant: momo steamers, Bhutuwa chicken and Pokhareli fish curry sit happily beside Sunday roasts, cask ales and Sky Sports match days.
Families, students, commuters and canine companions gather here for quiz nights, takeaway Fridays and sunny afternoons in the garden cabins.
features: England's largest thatched pub with free village parking
Authentic Nepalese menu crafted by Subodh Gautam and family
Heated garden cabins, terrace seating and Sky & TNT Sports
Dog friendly bar with water bowls and treats on hand

image.alt: Thatched exterior of The White Horse Waterbeach facing the village green

signatureDishes.title: Signature Nepalese Dishes
signatureDishes.subtitle: Stories behind the plates locals rave about

items.name: Bhutuwa Chicken
items.description: Owner Subodh Gautam's favourite: wok-fired chicken tossed with chilli, garlic and ginger, best shared with warm naan.

items.name: Pokhareli Fish Curry
items.description: Press-lauded chalk stream fish simmered with Himalayan spices, tomato, fenugreek and mustard seed heat.

items.name: Rara King Prawn
items.description: Tiger prawns finished on a sizzling platter with Nepalese masala, a Waterbeach bestseller since reopening.

items.quote: "Authentic ingredients and a rich, flavourful experience."
"Historic pub meets modern culinary flair - a true Cambridge gem."
"The locals were more excited than I am - they thought it would be flats, but the regulars turned up and were so welcoming."
items.source: Subodh Gautam speaking to Ely Standard, Feb 2025

hero.title: About The White Horse Waterbeach
hero.subtitle: England‚Äôs largest thatched pub reborn ‚Äî a Waterbeach village hub where authentic Nepalese cuisine meets British pub comfort.

story.title: Our Story
story.introduction: Opposite the Waterbeach village green, our thatched 1890 coaching inn was saved from redevelopment and relaunched on 6 February 2025. Today we blend a lively British pub with an authentic Nepalese kitchen ‚Äî momo steamers, Bhutuwa chicken and Pokhareli fish curry alongside cask ales, big‚Äëscreen sports and relaxed garden gatherings.

timeline.title: The Village Heart
timeline.description: For centuries, The White Horse has been at the heart of Waterbeach village life. Our historic thatched building - recognized as the largest thatched pub in the country - has witnessed countless community gatherings and celebrations.

timeline.title: Culinary Evolution
timeline.description: Through different eras ‚Äî from classic pub fare to gastropub ‚Äî we‚Äôve added new layers while staying a true village local.

timeline.title: The Nepalese-British Fusion
timeline.description: Reopened in February 2025, we embraced a distinctive model: an authentic Nepalese kitchen within a proper village pub. Two complementary experiences ‚Äî destination dining and a welcoming local ‚Äî preserving heritage while introducing vibrant Himalayan flavours.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: Absolutely wonderful! The Nepalese dishes are authentic and delicious, and the traditional pub atmosphere is so welcoming. Perfect for families.

items.name: Mike Thompson
items.text: Great food and fantastic service. The best of both worlds - proper pub classics and amazing curry. Highly recommended!

items.question: Do you accept bookings?
items.answer: Yes, we accept bookings online or by phone. We recommend booking in advance, especially for weekends and special events.

items.question: Are you family-friendly?
items.answer: Absolutely! We welcome families with children until 9pm. We have a children's menu and high chairs available.

items.question: Do you offer takeaway?
items.answer: Yes, we offer takeaway for both our Nepalese and British menu items. Call us on 01223277217 to place your order.

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: Yes, we have free parking available for our customers.

slides.alt: Thatched exterior of The White Horse Waterbeach on a bright day
slides.headline: Waterbeach's thatched landmark is alive with Nepalese flavour
slides.copy: Saved from redevelopment and relaunched February 2025, The White Horse pairs a historic coaching inn with Himalayan cooking and proper cask ales.

slides.alt: Copper-topped bar at The White Horse with cask ales and spirits
slides.headline: Authentic Nepalese kitchen meets favourite British bar
slides.copy: Share momo, Bhutuwa chicken or Sunday roasts while friends enjoy Sky Sports, cask ales and cocktails ‚Äî one roof, every occasion.

slides.alt: Nepalese sizzling mixed grill served with lemon at The White Horse
slides.headline: Bhutuwa chicken, Pokhareli fish & Rara king prawns lead the menu
slides.copy: Press-lauded dishes cooked by the Gautam family showcase Himalayan spice alongside comforting pub favourites and Sunday roasts.

slides.alt: Terrace with wicker chairs and parasols at The White Horse
slides.headline: Garden cabins, terrace seating & summer-ready parasols
slides.copy: Gather on the village green with heated cabins, picnic benches and community events from brunch to curry evenings.

slides.alt: Bar counter with handpulls and warm lighting at The White Horse
slides.headline: Live sports, quiz night and takeaway Fridays keep Waterbeach buzzing
slides.copy: Catch Premier League fixtures on Sky & TNT, tackle the Wednesday quiz or pick up Nepalese takeaway for the family every Friday night.
